entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of drizzle. High 10.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle ending this morning then mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early this morning. High 10. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Tuesday 03 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 60%
